arts.ttl: Watford's Bayo strikes again to edge out Oxford
arts.sum: Watford moved from seventh to fourth in the Championship table after Vakoun Bayo's second-half goal earned them a 1-0 victory at home to Oxford.

arts.ttl: Vakoun Bayo fires Watford to victory over Oxford as Hornets climb to fourth
arts.sum: Bayo struck the only goal of the game in the 54th minute.

arts.ttl: Des Buckingham left hometown Oxford United for a global coaching odyssey. Now he’s back making history
arts.sum: Buckingham embarked on a nomadic career in New Zealand, Australia and India. He tells Lawrence Ostlere how those experiences helped him restore Oxford to the Championship for the first time in 25 years
